title: A New laptop to Play lol
body:
Hello everyone. I want to buy a New laptop to Play lol. This is Lenovo 110 _ 15ACL
  CPU  AMD A6-7310
  RAM 4 GB
  Disk 1 TB 
  Te. Graphic AMD Radeon R4
  I wait that i could play about 50 fps in low graphics. Thanks.

replies.body: I couldn't tell you what to pick out, but I can suggest our[ recommended spec](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements)s guide.  This can help find a choice best fit for you! :D
